name: Zavvy
description: The way Zavvy work is going through the greatest revolution in decades. Remote and hybrid work models are here to stay. Employees are looking for more in an employer than just money. Technologies are drastically shortening the half-life of skills. And organizations have to rethink the way they foster collaboration, growth, and culture. Our goal is to equip innovative companies with all the tools they need to foster their talent to drive engagement and stay competitive. All while deeply integrated the different components and helping People teams save time via automations and AI.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline:
The People Enablement Platform
 How growing businesses unlock their people potential
ShortDescription: Zavvy lets people teams run people development, performance, and engagement like innovative tech giants. AI-powered.

Highlights.name: Powerful AI
Highlights.description: Achieve a greater impact than ever while saving valuable time. Zavvy AI lets you create courses, career frameworks, and more in just a few clicks.

Highlights.name: Best-in-class consultation
Highlights.description: Where other tool providers will leave you alone, we'll not only guide you through our proven process, but proactively share best practices from top companies.

Highlights.name: One solution that connects the dots
Highlights.description: Instead of overwhelming your people with multiple tools and overwhelming yourself by trying to connect them all, Zavvy brings together everything people development, training, performance, analytics, and more in one place.

enhanced_description: Zavvy is a People Enablement Platform designed to equip growing and innovative businesses with comprehensive tools to foster talent, drive engagement, and maintain competitiveness in the evolving landscape of remote and hybrid work models, changing employee expectations, and rapidly shortening skill half-lives. The platform deeply integrates various components, including onboarding, performance management, and training, into a single solution that also encompasses people development, analytics, and more. It leverages powerful AI and automations to save People teams valuable time, enabling them to easily create courses, career frameworks, and other resources with just a few clicks. Zavvy aims to help People teams manage people development, performance, and engagement with the efficiency and innovation seen in leading tech companies.
